name: Amane Kanata Third Costume Locon LORAs
description:
A Locon LORA based off of Amane Kanata's third costume released in 2021, or what I would like to call "Beret Kanatan"

This is a LORAs made with the Locon method, you will have to install this extension made by KohakuBlueLeaf into your webui to fully use a Locon LORAs

https://github.com/KohakuBlueleaf/a1111-sd-webui-locon

This LORAs was made with minimal tag pruning so if the trigger token

"beretkanatan"/"noberetkanatan"

isn't enough to trigger the whole outfit use these additional tags along with the trigger token

beretkanatan: "multicolored hair, partially fingerless black gloves, grey hair, mini wings, angel wings, blue hair, white jacket, white beret, single hair intake, hair ornament, colored inner hair, single blue thighhigh, white sneakers, purple eyes, hairclip, single sock, thigh strap, long hair, hair rings, asymmetrical legwear, single black kneehigh, streaked hair, long sleeves, closed mouth, twintails, open jacket, standing, star necklace, necklace, pleated skirt, asymmetrical bangs, uneven legwear, puffy long sleeves, smile, black dress, blue skirt, hooded jacket, blue belt, frills, thigh pouch"

noberetkanatan: "long hair, multicolored hair, grey hair, colored inner hair, blue hair, angel wings, mini wings, purple eyes, star halo, partially fingerless gloves, thigh strap, black gloves, hair ornament, dress, bangs, two side up, jewelry, pleated dress, single thighhigh, black dress, frills, bare shoulders, thighhighs, hairclip, necklace, gradient dress, belt, sleeveless"

CC license

https://mega.nz/file/qExmQBQA#9eyI78TMEJu8V4c84UWitrlDAjyqxrxSVc1D5ktb87k

meta.prompt: <lora:Beretkanata-V7:1>beretkanatan, 1girl, solo, multicolored hair, partially fingerless black gloves, grey hair, full body, mini wings, angel wings, blue hair, white jacket, white beret, single hair intake, hair ornament, colored inner hair, single blue thighhigh, white sneakers, purple eyes, hairclip, single sock, thigh strap, long hair, hair rings, asymmetrical legwear, single black kneehigh, streaked hair, long sleeves, closed mouth, twintails, open jacket, standing, star necklace, necklace, (white background:1.5), pleated skirt, asymmetrical bangs, uneven legwear, puffy long sleeves, smile, black dress, blue skirt, hooded jacket, blue belt, frills, thigh pouch
meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), (monochrome:1.2), (mutated hands, mutated fingers, deformed fingers, deformed hands:1.1)

meta.prompt: <lora:Beretkanata-V7:1>noberetkanatan1girl, solo, virtual youtuber, long hair, gloves, wings, multicolored hair, official alternate hair length, grey hair, colored inner hair, blue hair, angel wings, purple eyes, halo, star halo, official alternate hairstyle, partially fingerless gloves, angel, thigh strap, black gloves, hair ornament, dress, smile, looking at viewer, bangs, open mouth, two side up, jewelry, feathered wings, white background, pleated dress, single thighhigh, black dress, simple background, frills, bare shoulders, thighhighs, hairclip, necklace, gradient dress, belt, cowboy shot, index finger raised, finger to mouth, sleeveless, white wings
